:::Torca:::

::He was so bored that he was pacing all around the CF.  All of a 
sudden he saw Skulletron, bleeding to death::
Torca: Whoa. Computer, identify energy signature.
Computer: energy signature identified, Skulletron, Alliance member
Torca: Alliance.  hes an enemy.
::He fires a shot from his dorsal gun at Skulletron::



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Dark Lavacons::
> 
>         The Dark Lavacons immediately stop firing, when commanded 
by Starscream.  Then, they recieved a message from Zardus.
> 
>           Astral turned to Starscream.
> 
>           "Hey, nice meeting you, but we must leave, the path of 
destruction is ours to create!!!" Astral laughed demonically, firing 
a missile from his dark flame rocket launcher, which hit the ground 
in front of Starscream, and made a ring of dark fire around him, but 
not to hurt him. 
> 
>         They all said goodbye quickly and in an instant got up and 
sped off towards the battle.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> ::Skulletron::
> 
>           Skulletron continues limping down a corridor, holding his 
bleeding side.  Two autoguns popped up and started blasting holes in 
his upper body, up to the chest.  He kept going back, mech fluid was 
spurting everywhere with each blast.  Soon, he was bound to be found 
out.  He took out his raygun and just as h was going to press the 
trigger, he put it back, rolling to dodge shots.  He didn't need his 
weaponfire to be detected.  Suddenly, he felt something in him, a big 
boost of energy.  Unintentionally, his body sprang into action.  
Skulletron did a somersault forward, in between the two autoguns, and 
landed behind them.  He grabbed them, and used force to turn them to 
face each other, then let go quickly.  The two autoguns blasted 
eachother.  Skulletron gave a thumbs up to himself, and then fell 
down on the ground.  Mech fluid poured and poured.  Skulletron knew 
it, he was going to die.  But, he wouldn't let himself go that 
easily.  He fought death.  But, he didn't know how long he could 
fight it.
> 
>        He opened his comlink to all Alliance members.
> 
>        "This is.....This is....." He spat out some mech 
fluid, "This is Skulletron........Ughh.........." He yelled in pain 
as a spasm of pain hit him, "Rescue me......Release me from 
these.....These......." Skulletron coughed up more mech fluid, "Send 
somebody to get me.........Get 
me...........I'm...I...I....I'm.....I'm......I'm 
dieing.........Slowly dieing..........Need.....Help......" 
Skulletron's optics closed, and he was still alive, but in really bad 
shape.  His body just lay there in a massive pool of mechfluid, 
growing.
